format: BitBake recipe (similar to a shell script with special syntax)
description: This file defines a dummy SDK package in a build system, using BitBake syntax. It includes package metadata, inheritance, and functions to manipulate package variables and dependencies.

methods.name: python()
methods.description: Defines a Python function to set the PACKAGE_ARCH variable to a dummy architecture, ensuring the package is excluded from the build.

methods.name: populate_packages:prepend()
methods.description: A Python function that prepends dependency and conflict entries related to the dummy package into the package's variable lists.
